body.p: In 2016, the Board analysed the effects of changes to the definitions of an asset and a liability proposed in the 2015 Exposure Draft. This exercise had two objectives:

li.p: to enable both the Board and stakeholders to assess implications of the proposals for future Standards; and
to help to identify any problems with the proposed definitions and supporting guidance.
